casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robin Medford JONES. No. 435P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 15, 2005. Reita P. Pendry, for Jones. Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State.

AMENDED ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of August 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of August 2005."
